name: Milk man commits tax fraud
description:
the dary tax has been risen.
You've decided that selling milk cheaper and not paying taxes will bring way more profits than selling them normaly.

Drive around a city in a milk van, sell milk and avoid the irs.

controlls:
AD/left stick x - turn

W/right trigger - accelerate

S/left trigger - break/revarce

E/A - yeet out milk

Space/right bumper - hand break

Shift/left bumper - boost
